titleStmt.title: A familiar exposition or commentarie on Ecclesiastes VVherein the worlds vanity, and the true felicitie are plainely deciphered. By Thomas Granger, preacher of the Word at Butterwike in East-holland, Lincolne.
titleStmt.author: Granger, Thomas, b. 1578.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. S[nodham] for Thomas Pauier, dwelling in Iuie-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A B² ² B-Y Z⁴ [sec.]⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
